name: kali Linux
description: Kali Linux is an open-source, Debian-based Linux distribution geared towards various information security tasks, such as Penetration Testing, Security Research, Computer Forensics, and Reverse Engineering.

name: TryHackMe
description: TryHackMe provides a hands-on cybersecurity skill experience in the real world.

name: HackTheBox
description: HackTheBox platform provides projects focused on solving real-world issues in cyber security and ethical hacking.

name: Cybrary
description: Cybrary is an accessible, affordable training platform that provides curated career paths in cybersecurity, threat-informed training, and more.
